projects.title: Feed Buffer Website
projects.brief: A Tech Focused content for the students to keep aware about what's happening in the tech industry. The website has been hosted on the blogger.com
projects.description: Feed Buffer is a comprehensive social media management tool that allows businesses to schedule posts, analyze performance, and engage with their audience across multiple platforms. The project focused on creating an intuitive user interface with powerful backend capabilities.

projects.title: SRM Portal
projects.brief: A platform for SRM Institute students to access resources, submit assignments, and collaborate on projects.
projects.description: The SRM Portal is a comprehensive web application designed to enhance the academic experience of students at SRM Institute. It provides a centralized platform for accessing course materials, submitting assignments, and collaborating with peers. The portal features real-time notifications, grade tracking, and seamless integration with university systems.

testimonial.quote: The SRM Portal has revolutionized how our students interact with academic resources. It's intuitive, fast, and has significantly improved student engagement.
testimonial.author: Dr. Sarah Johnson, Academic Director at SRM Institute

projects.title: Session: Google Gemini AI
projects.brief: A technical session conducted on Google Gemini AI, covering the onboarding guidelines for students.
projects.description: Delivered an engaging technical session on Google Gemini AI, focusing on onboarding the new student ambassadors to Google community Program. This session was exclusive for the people selected from 100000 Student applications. The session included hands-on demonstrations, real-world applications of AI onboarding guidelines do's and don'ts, and strategies for effective CA role. Participants learned how to leverage Google Gemini's capabilities to enhance their projects and academic pursuits.

testimonial.quote: Sanjay's session on Google Gemini was incredibly insightful and practical. The hands-on examples and real-world applications made complex AI concepts accessible to everyone.
testimonial.author: Tech Event Organizer

photos.alt: Sanjay presenting Google Gemini AI session
Technical demonstration of Gemini API features
Audience engagement during Gemini AI presentation
Perks and Onboarding Swags for the people.

projects.title: Eco Tracker App
projects.brief: A mobile application helping users reduce their carbon footprint through daily habit tracking and personalized recommendations.
projects.description: Eco Tracker is an innovative mobile application that empowers users to make environmentally conscious decisions in their everyday lives. The app provides personalized recommendations, tracks carbon savings, and builds a community of eco-conscious individuals working toward a sustainable future.

testimonial.quote: Working with the team resulted in an app that exceeds our expectations and has already made a measurable impact on our users' environmental habits.
testimonial.author: Michael Chen, Founder of GreenTech Solutions
